description: This traditional favourite is a filling dinner, perfect for a cosy evening in.
keywords: Lamb pie,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Lamb Shepherds Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium white onion, peeled and diced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 170Â°C. Heat up a pan to a medium heat and dry the minced lamb while tossing for 10 minutes or until starts to turn brown.
Add the chopped onion, carrot, leek, garlic and peas and continue to fry for a further 5 minutes. Add the beef stock and herbs and allow to simmer for 10 minutes or until the sauce starts to reduce.
Cook your cubed potatoes in salted water for 15 minutes and then drain the liquid. Mash the seasoning, milk and butter into the potatoes and set to one side.
In a casserole dish, place your lamb mix at the bottom without the liquid. Top with the mashed potatoes.
Bake in oven for 25 minutes or until the top begins to brown and serve with the juice from the lamb if needed.
